titleInfo.title: 'Administration Report of the Persian Gulf Political Residency for the Years 1911-1914'

physicalDescription.extent: There is a list of contents toward the front of each Report.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at 2 on the first folio after the front cover, and terminates at 242 on the back cover. These numbers are written in pencil and enclosed in a circle, and appear in the top right hand corner of the recto page of each folio.
